info: The BMW X4 is a compact luxury crossover SUV manufactured by BMW since 2014. It is marketed as a sports activity coupé (SAC),[1] the second model from BMW marketed as such after the X6, and features styling elements and the roofline of a traditional two-door coupé.[2] The X4 is widely considered as a "coupé" version of the X3, trading its practicality with a sloping rear roof which offers a sportier styling.
